channel.title: Abraham2119, disgrace with C guru cup
channel.description:
abraham2119 has a C guru cup and I am not happy. :mad:
Its disguisting thats people like super, frank_, etc should share an award with someone like abraham2119. By awarding the cup to abraham2119, the forum administration has made it next to worthless.
I've got a conundrum for you, either remove abraham2119's C cup, or remove my one. I will not share it with the likes of him.
To put it another way, [i]either he goes or I go[/i].
If you have a C cup and you dont want abraham2119 having one, post in this thread asking admins to remove your cup too.
much info here http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grade_inflation
EDIT: i just wanted to add I've got nothing against abraham2119 as a person.

item.title: Abraham2119, disgrace with C guru cup

@runescape3dude wrote:

I would rather we all point and laugh at abraham for a while before the thread gets locked.

Read full topic

item.title: Abraham2119, disgrace with C guru cup
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“chrisn2323, post:100, topic:301448”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=397742.msg2960694#msg2960694 date=1253156697]

MOAR AWARDS IS BIGGER PENIS.

Not really. I mean in the pokemon game you could have 6 pokemon at level 40, whereas I might have one pokemon at level 100! And if that one pokemon was Mew then I’d probably beat you.
[/quote]
wow stfu[/quote]
wait… who are you?

narrow down awards.
i don’t need either of my awards tbh- SRL is what now? Runescape is what now? and I haven’t been on IRC in months.
take them away, reset my rep, i couldn’t care less, it all means shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Abraham2119, disgrace with C guru cup
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:95, topic:301448”][quote author=oksuper_ link=topic=397742.msg2960187#msg2960187 date=1253137913]

[quote author=Frell link=topic=397742.msg2959493#msg2959493 date=1253064726]

[quote author=ownagesbot link=topic=397742.msg2958641#msg2958641 date=1253005652]

HE KNOWS C, HE IS NOT A GURU. END OF. POINT AND CASE.
[/quote]i dont know even fucking know you and vice-versa, you surely do not know me well enough to judge. as i said:

the only people that might actually know me well enough to judge me are super_ and nueb35, and im pretty sure they were both in accordance with the award[/quote]
[/quote]Until you can prove that you’re a guru, you shouldn’t have this award. You won’t prove you’re a guru, 'cause you aint. Brb whilst I post my C IRC lib, lets see if I get C guru… that’s pretty much all you’ve got it for, any old fool can write something like a C IRC lib, theres fucking examples and tutorials all over the place. Fuck me.

he also got help from super_ getting it iirc

Uh no.

Abraham told me that you said he should have it [s]and that you were trying to get it for him =[/s][/quote]
fix’t

Read full topic

item.title: Abraham2119, disgrace with C guru cup
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:87, topic:301448”]There’s no point in removing current cups unless people really don’t deserve them. I’d just reconsider some of the more recent awards given out then bring a new system.

IRC Legend had purpose at Kaitnieks but doesn’t really anymore, if I were you I’d give out to the original people who used to use Kaitnieks IRC actively then let that award become prestigous and unobtainable. I bet there’s less than 20 of us who’d have it then so it’ll actually have some value (Like the AutoRune crew award)[/quote]

I’m fairly confident that kaitnieks did not have an IRC award of any type. The only awards I remember there is the staff, java, scar, autorune and batman cups. I may have missed one or two, but that was pretty much it.

But nowadays, I think the IRC award is just too hard to decide who gets it and who doesn’t so I think it should just be removed.

Read full topic
item.source: Abraham2119, disgrace with C guru cup

item.title: Abraham2119, disgrace with C guru cup
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

This is moparisthebest, not kaitnieks.

Read full topic
item.source: Abraham2119, disgrace with C guru cup

item.title: Abraham2119, disgrace with C guru cup
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:87, topic:301448”]There’s no point in removing current cups unless people really don’t deserve them. I’d just reconsider some of the more recent awards given out then bring a new system.

IRC Legend had purpose at Kaitnieks but doesn’t really anymore, if I were you I’d give out to the original people who used to use Kaitnieks IRC actively then let that award become prestigous and unobtainable. I bet there’s less than 20 of us who’d have it then so it’ll actually have some value (Like the AutoRune crew award)[/quote]
I don’t like the idea of locking people out of the IRC award. Autorune doesn’t operate now and isn’t developed, however we still have an IRC presence which all are welcome to take part in; why should the members of today be prohibited from things, especially when those things are of a trivial nature?

Read full topic
item.source: Abraham2119, disgrace with C guru cup

item.title: Abraham2119, disgrace with C guru cup
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

This is the most childish thread I’ve ever read here, I almost felt like I clicked a link to moparscape.

I don’t know much about the situation, but get the fuck over it it’s a damn picture that barely represents a thing.

I (and most likely many others) don’t have any more respect for you if you have that picture or not.

Read full topic
item.source: Abraham2119, disgrace with C guru cup

item.title: Abraham2119, disgrace with C guru cup
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

There’s no point in removing current cups unless people really don’t deserve them. I’d just reconsider some of the more recent awards given out then bring a new system.

IRC Legend had purpose at Kaitnieks but doesn’t really anymore, if I were you I’d give out to the original people who used to use Kaitnieks IRC actively then let that award become prestigous and unobtainable. I bet there’s less than 20 of us who’d have it then so it’ll actually have some value (Like the AutoRune crew award)

Read full topic
